thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical proposes 2017 dividend payment plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical proposes 2017 dividend payment plan

organizations.name: reuters) - shanxi zhendong pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says actual controller proposed to pay a cash dividend of 0.4 yuan for every 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares, as the dividend payment plan for 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/RKAuhc
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
